# Government Tender Announcement
### K7A40-240771 Personal Watercrafts and Double Trailer
#### Solicitation Number: WS4413318494
#### Reference Number: WS4413318494-Doc4542809395

**Tender Status**: This solicitation has been **Cancelled**.

Please note that the original closing date has been **Extended**. Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and responses by **2024-05-13 at 14:00:00 EST**. Responses submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Summary of Requirement**:
This tender is for the purchase of **(2) Personal Watercrafts and (1) Double Trailer**. There are no security requirements associated with this contract. The procurement is subject to the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.

**Contract Details**:

* **Procurement Method**: Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada
* **End User**: Department of the Environment (ECCC)

**Bidder Information**:

* **Contact Person**: Heureuse Saint-Juste (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [heureuse.saint-juste@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:heureuse.saint-juste@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19456435?extsite=MTk0NTY0MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19456435?extsite=MTk0NTY0MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

I have also removed unnecessary phrases and words to stay within the 400-word limit. Please review the revised entry for accuracy.  Let me know if you require further assistance.
